# ends_with()

### 1. Brief Description
The ends_with() function is used to identify whether a character vector ends with a pattern. It returns a logical vector indicating if there is a match. 

### 2. What package contains it
The ends_with() function is contained in the stringr package.

### 3. When to use it
It is useful when wanting to test if a given character string follows a specific pattern.
